markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Silent Bell](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1628)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 83</row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Member of a secret society

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This large handbell is made from cast bronze and has a wooden handle. The outside of the bell is covered in fine etchings, showing a group of varied people sitting around a table with clouds obscuring anyone in the background. The clapper is curiously absent from this bell and, when idly rung, it produces no audible sound.

<document level="2" id="action-1240" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Silent Bell
